name: Word Search Pack - Find Hidden Crosswords, NumberLink, Unblock Block & Sudoku Puzzles Quest Mode
name_original: Word Search Pack - Find Hidden Crosswords, NumberLink, Unblock Block & Sudoku Puzzles Quest Mode
description:
Word Search Pack contains 4 free games：word search, unblock, flow(NumberLink) and Sudoku.

Word search is a word game that consists of the letters of words placed in a grid, which usually has a rectangular or square shape. The objective of this puzzle is to find and mark all the words hidden inside the box. The words may be placed horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

Unblock is a simple and addictive challenged puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way, unblock it with the minimal moves. Unblock comes with 4 modes from Easy to Expert. There are over 10000 puzzles in total.

NumberLink
Connect matching colors with pipe, pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But be careful, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Sudoku is a logic-based, number-placement puzzle.
The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids that compose the grid contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.
